headline: Is Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL) the Best FMCG Stock to Buy According to Billionaires?
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Best FMCG Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) stands against other best FMCG stocks to buy according to billionaires. Historically, the consumer-packaged-goods (CPG) industry outperformed most of the other industries, mainly due to the […]
